name: rexreplace
description: Smoothly search & replace in files from CLI.
author: Mathias Rangel Wulff

scripts.test: yarn build && yarn test-cli && yarn test-js
scripts.postbuild: npx rexreplace@7 '^(#!.+\n)?' '$1import { createRequire as createImportMetaRequire } from 'module'; import.meta.require ||= (id) => createImportMetaRequire(import.meta.url)(id);\n' -GM bin/rexreplace.cli.js && cp bin/rexreplace.cli.js bin/rexreplace.cli.min.js
scripts.build-only: swc src/ -d dist/ && bun build --target node src/env/node.ts --outfile bin/rexreplace.cli.js
scripts.test-minify: yarn build-minify && yarn test-cli && yarn test-js
scripts.test-cli: (true || (npm uninstall -g rexreplace && npm -g install ./)) && yarn test-cli-only
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn is-git-clean && git fetch && git rebase origin/main && yarn test-minify && yarn load-options && yarn bump
scripts.test-format: yarn prettier --list-different || (echo 'Please correct file formatting using `yarn format` and try again.' && exit 1)
scripts.is-git-clean: (git diff --quiet --exit-code --cached && git diff --quiet --exit-code) || (echo Please commit or stash changes && exit 1)
